thread.title: Ariana Grande’s First New Solo Music in 3 Years Coming This Week
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande’s First New Solo Music in 3 Years Coming This Week

author: Peter Helman
title: Ariana Grande’s First New Solo Music in 3 Years Coming This Week
text: Ariana Grande is returning with her first new solo music in over three years. The pop star took to Instagram to officially announce her new single "Yes, And?" on Sunday, revealing that it will be available to purchase and stream this coming Friday, Jan. 12. "yes, and? ♡ 1.12,” Grande wrote alongside a blurry close-up of her face wearing red lipstick, which appears to be the song's cover artwork. Although she has appeared on collaborations and remixes with artists including Kelly Clarkson, Doja Cat and the Weeknd, Grande has not released any solo music since Positions in October 2020. In the meantime, she has focused on her R.E.M. Beauty brand and her starring role as Glinda in John Chu's upcoming Wicked films. Late last year, Grande [confirmed that her long-awaited seventh album](https://themessenger.com/entertainment/ariana-grande-teases-new-music-see-you-next-year-wicked-studio), which she worked on with longtime collaborators Max Martin and Ilya Salmanzadeh, would be out in 2024. "See you next year," she wrote on social media. [Ariana Grande Teases New Music Once Again: ‘See You Next Year’](/entertainment/ariana-grande-teases-new-music-see-you-next-year-wicked-studio?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Ariana Grande Is Back in the Recording Studio, Teases New Music](/entertainment/ariana-grande-teases-new-music-back-in-recording-studio-photos?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Ariana Grande and Ethan Slater Pose Backstage Together at Broadway Musical](/entertainment/ariana-grande-ethan-slater-photographed-instagram-broadway?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Ariana Grande’s New Boyfriend Ethan Slater Files for Divorce From Wife: Report](/entertainment/ariana-grandes-new-boyfriend-ethan-slater-files-for-divorce-from-wife-report?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez Signed Prenup, New Court Documents Reveal](/entertainment/ariana-grande-dalton-gomez-signed-prenup-court-documents-reveal?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez Both File for Divorce](/entertainment/ariana-grande-husband-dalton-gomez-file-for-divorce?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) Just before the new year, she [posted a lengthy statement reflecting on her 2023](https://themessenger.com/entertainment/ariana-grande-most-challenging-yet-happiest-year-ethan-slater-romance), which she described as "one of the most transformative, most challenging, and yet happiest and most special years of my life.” "There were so many beautiful and yet polarized feelings," Grande wrote. "I've never felt more at the mercy of and in acceptance of what life was screaming to teach me. I've never felt more fulfilled by or present in my work, being able to cherish every moment." "I gave everything I could have possibly given of my heart and of myself to the projects I was fortunate enough to be a part of and learned so much from every brilliant, beautiful soul that I had the privilege of creating art with and crossing paths with this year."
